Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • Player

  • public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    A class that creates a player
    Author:
    takdag

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        getName() gets the name of the player and returns that name
        Returns:
        the name of the player

      • location

        public java.lang.String location()
        location() gets the name of the room that the player is currently in
        Returns:
        the name of the room

      • setLocation

        public void setLocation(Room currentRoom)
        set the location of the player
        Parameters:
        the - new location of the player

      • pickUpItem

        public boolean pickUpItem(java.lang.String x)
        boolean pickUpItem allows a player to pick up an item player calls on the inventory of the room to see if item is in room. If item is in room, then remove the item from inventory of room to inventory of the player.
        Parameters:
        String - x
        Returns:
        true if the item is in the inventory of the room

      • dropItem

        public boolean dropItem(java.lang.String x)
        Remove an item from the player's inventory
        Parameters:
        String - x
        Returns:
        false if there is no item in the player's inventory true if player has an item in their inventory

      • moveRooms

        public boolean moveRooms(java.lang.String s)
        moveRooms Takes in a door name (string) and asks the room if that is a valid exit. if the exit is valid, then the current room will send back the next room and change the players location
        Parameters:
        s - is the name of the door the player wishes to 'open' / go through
        Returns:
        true if player went to next room, false if next room doesnt exist

      • getDescription

        public java.lang.String getDescription()
        getDescription gets a description of the room
        Returns:
        the string description of room
